sense.def:
A description
je pripoved o tem, kakšen je nekdo ali nekaj.

Description
je pripovedovanje, kakšna je neka oseba ali stvar.

seg.quote: The relationships in his family are so complex that description is almost impossible.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
of a particular description
, je take vrste.

seg.quote: Her dress was too tight to have concealed a weapon of any description.
